Configure Project/Semaphores

Use the Configure Project dialog box (Admin | Configure Project | General Tab | Miscellaneous | Semaphores) to set the semaphore options, which prevent data corruption by coordinating the activities of programs and processes in multi-user and multi-tasking environments. The options are:

  • The directory where the semaphore file is created.
  • The delay time between attempts to gain exclusive access to an archive.
  • The number of times Version Manager will attempt to gain exclusive access to an archive.
  • The suffix (extension) of semaphore files.

Field Descriptions

Miscellaneous | Semaphores
Semaphore Directory Archive Directory - Places the semaphore files in each archive directory.
Other Directory - Places the semaphore files in a directory other than the archive directory. Specify the path of the directory in the edit field.
Semaphore Suffix Specify the suffix template for semaphore files. The default suffix is +-sem, which causes Version Manager to add the characters -sem to the end of the archive file name.
Number of Retries Specify how many attempts Version Manager will make to gain exclusive access to an archive or journal file in networked environments. The default is 6.
Retry Delay (in seconds) Specify the delay between attempts to gain exclusive access to archives, journal files, and the access control database. The default is three seconds.
